case.title: Come with me Please !! - 23
case.text:
Hi guys ,
I am a young black girl looking for a flat to rent ASAP , but landlord won't take me seriously cause I am young , so I was wondering if there's someone Nice out there you want to come with me flat hunting Please ! P.S: I do not need your money or whatever I just need someone To come with so they can take me seriously.
Thanks a lot guys this is a genuine ad no time wasters please .
